MatchedTerms.CandidateTerm: This gives an indication of the field in which the company operates (Industry Name):select
The value of a company's outstanding shares, as measured by shares times current price (MG Market Cap):select
A stock's dividend expressed as a percentage of the share price. (Current Div Yield):select
MatchedTerms.TargetTerm: Dividend yield greater than or equal to: (yld):select

MatchedTerms.CandidateTerm: Measures the price performance of a stock in comparison to all other stocks (12 Month Relative Strength):select
The rate at which revenue grew from the previous 12 month period to the most recent one (Rev Growth Annual vs Annual):select
MatchedTerms.TargetTerm: 3-year revenue growth greater than or equal to: (revgrth3yr):select

MatchedTerms.CandidateTerm: Also known as the "multiple", this is the latest closing price divided by the latest 12 months' earnings per share (PE):select
MatchedTerms.TargetTerm: Trailing P E ratio less than or equal to: (curpte):select
